metadata.title: Comprehensive Question Bank
metadata.description: A collection of various question types for assessments
metadata.author: Your Name

questions.question: Which of these is the bigger in our universe?
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' markerWidth='10' markerHeight='7' refX='9' refY='3.5' orient='auto'><polygon points='0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7' fill='black'></polygon></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='black'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='30' y1='50' x2='70' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'></line><circle cx='30' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'></circle><circle cx='70' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'></circle><text x='25' y='50' text-anchor='end' dominant-baseline='middle' font-size='12' fill='black'>A</text><text x='75' y='50' text-anchor='start' dominant-baseline='middle' font-size='12' fill='black'>B</text><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)'></line><line x1='130' y1='50' x2='170' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'></line></svg>
questions.explanation: Jupiter is more than twice as massive as all other planets combined.

svg_design_description: SVG viewBox must be '0 0 300 40' (width 300 or 350, height 40)
Always include: width='100%' height='40px' in SVG attributes
Required structure: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 300 40' width='100%' height='40px' preserveAspectRatio='xMidYMid meet'>
Background rectangle: <rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='#f8f9fa' rx='4'/>
All graphical elements must fit within viewBox boundaries
Stroke widths should be 1.5px minimum for visibility
Include matching alt text for accessibility
For exact alignment: center elements vertically at y=20
jpg_design_description: Image dimensions: Minimum 600×80px (2x resolution for sharpness)
Aspect ratio: Strictly 7.5:1 (width:height) to match SVG viewBox
Display size: Will render at 100% width × 40px height
- Key elements must be within center 40px vertical zone

questions.question: Water is solid.

questions.explanation: This is a common myth. The Great Wall is not visible to the naked eye from space.

questions.question: Name of person, place or thing
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' markerWidth='10' markerHeight='7' refX='9' refY='3.5' orient='auto'><polygon points='0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7' fill='black'></polygon></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='black'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='30' y1='50' x2='70' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'></line><circle cx='30' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'></circle><circle cx='70' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'></circle><text x='25' y='50' text-anchor='end' dominant-baseline='middle' font-size='12' fill='black'>A</text><text x='75' y='50' text-anchor='start' dominant-baseline='middle' font-size='12' fill='black'>B</text><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)'></line><line x1='130' y1='50' x2='170' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'></line></svg>
acceptable_variations: A body remains in its state of rest or uniform motion unless compelled to change by an external force.
Objects maintain their velocity unless a force acts upon them.

grading_rubric.full_credit: Includes both parts (rest and motion) and mentions external force
grading_rubric.no_credit: Completely incorrect or missing key concepts

questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' markerWidth='10' markerHeight='7' refX='9' refY='3.5' orient='auto'><polygon points='0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7' fill='black'></polygon></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='black'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='30' y1='50' x2='70' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'></line><circle cx='30' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'></circle><circle cx='70' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'></circle><text x='25' y='50' text-anchor='end' dominant-baseline='middle' font-size='12' fill='black'>A</text><text x='75' y='50' text-anchor='start' dominant-baseline='middle' font-size='12' fill='black'>B</text><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)'></line><line x1='130' y1='50' x2='170' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'></line></svg>

<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><defs><marker id='arrow' markerWidth='10' markerHeight='7' refX='9' refY='3.5' orient='auto'><polygon points='0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7' fill='black'></polygon></marker><marker id='dot' markerWidth='5' markerHeight='5' refX='2.5' refY='2.5' orient='auto'><circle cx='2.5' cy='2.5' r='2.5' fill='black'></circle></marker></defs><line x1='30' y1='50' x2='70' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'></line><circle cx='30' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'></circle><circle cx='70' cy='50' r='3' fill='black'></circle><text x='25' y='50' text-anchor='end' dominant-baseline='middle' font-size='12' fill='black'>A</text><text x='75' y='50' text-anchor='start' dominant-baseline='middle' font-size='12' fill='black'>B</text><line x1='100' y1='30' x2='100' y2='70' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' marker-start='url(#dot)'></line><line x1='130' y1='50' x2='170' y2='50' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'></line></svg>
questions.question: click for appropriate symbol
questions.explanation: For most values of x < 3, B (2x+5) is greater than A (3x+2), so A < B.

questions.question: Tick which are more in number.
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 300 150' width='100%'  style='max-width: 400px; display: block; margin: auto;'><rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='#e0f7ff' /><line x1='150' y1='0' x2='150' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' /><ellipse cx='50' cy='30' rx='15' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='#aaa' /><ellipse cx='100' cy='30' rx='15' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='#aaa' /><ellipse cx='50' cy='75' rx='15' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='#aaa' /><ellipse cx='100' cy='75' rx='15' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='#aaa' /><ellipse cx='50' cy='120' rx='15' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='#aaa' /><ellipse cx='100' cy='120' rx='15' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='#aaa' /><ellipse cx='200' cy='60' rx='15' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='#aaa' /><ellipse cx='250' cy='90' rx='15' ry='20' fill='white' stroke='#aaa' /></svg>

feedback.correct: Correct! You picked the side with more objects.
feedback.incorrect: Try again. Count the objects carefully.

description: tick box position are top_right, bottom_right, top_left, bottom_left
partition_direction can be vertical or horizontal
Use viewBox and avoid fixed widths in svg
user response can be left, right, null, top, bottom

svg_creation: Set width='100%' with max-width in style

questions.question: Tick which are more in number.
